meanings: (책임·빚 등을) shoulder, bear, take on, take over (=떠맡다)
lift sb up in one's arms
raise [lift] in one's arms, help get to his feet, pick up (넘어진 사람을), help sit up in bed(누워 있는 사람을).
실용회화-애정표현 Hold me tight, my darling!

meanings.meaning: lift a child over a ditch
